about_the_game:
‘Captain Contraption’s Chocolate Factory’ soundtrack features 14 tracks, comprising of melodic Lo-Fi beats and poignant piano music.
The score combines metallic, industrial sounds with a host of live instrumentalists (David Knight, Joshua Lascar, Naomi Roberts, Hugh Davies, Julia Stein, Akito Goto) to reflect the robot’s existence in a once human world.
